LanguageData.AshesWaterTolerance.label: Ashes water tolerance
LanguageData.AshesWaterTolerance.description: The special herbs and ashes from the nuclear bombardment jungle dissolved in Go-juice cause a short-term effect of superhigh regeneration with powerful side effects, but if your colonist is about to die in a couple of hours, this is the only way.
LanguageData.AshesWaterHediff.label: Super regeneration
LanguageData.AshesWaterHediff.description: The special herbs and ashes from the nuclear bombardment jungle dissolved in Go-juice cause a short-term effect of superhigh regeneration with powerful side effects, but if your colonist is about to die in a couple of hours, this is the only way.
LanguageData.AshesWaterAddiction.label: Ashes water addiction
LanguageData.AshesWaterAddiction.description: The special herbs and ashes from the nuclear bombardment jungle dissolved in Go-juice cause a short-term effect of superhigh regeneration with powerful side effects, but if your colonist is about to die in a couple of hours, this is the only way.
LanguageData.AshesWaterAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
